name: DisorderOfVisualCortexDueToUnderlyingCondition
title: Disorder of Visual Cortex Due to Underlying Condition
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent disorders of the visual cortex that are due to an underlying condition.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with disorders of the visual cortex that are due to an underlying condition.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
